item.description:
Weather.com says there will be "a few showers" from 10 - 12 tomorrow. I know it's a bit subjective, but if it's drizzling at 9:30 am, I will leave my house to go to the park. I'll be bringing my umbrella! If by chance it's pouring, I will consider this meetup cancelled and I will post that info right here.



One of the other Meetup Groups has doggie meetups at Bradley Palmer State Park and they give it good reviews, so let's give it a try!

We'll meet inside the main entrance parking lot at 10 a.m. Please be on time; we'll wait about 10 minutes for everyone who RSVP'd "Yes", then get started on our walk.

***** Please bring plenty of pooper-scooper bags to pick up after your dog. *****

Thanks!
-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel July Meetup
